titles.title: A resolution designating the week of November 14 through 20, 2011, as "Global Entrepreneurship Week/USA".
A resolution designating the week of November 14 through 20, 2011, as "Global Entrepreneurship Week/USA".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Designates the week of November 14-20, 2011, as "Global Entrepreneurship Week/USA."
Supports the goals of such Week, including: (1) inspiring young people to embrace innovation, imagination, and creativity; and (2) training the next generation of entrepreneurial leaders.
